metadata.name: Lux et Umbra
metadata.description: Lux et Umbra is a dynamic NFT that switches between night and day according to the time zone of the viewer. The fluctuation between night and day represents the culture of GM and GN in web3 that unites us all. The greco-roman style of the piece refers to the fact that artists and collectors alike are currently actively participating in the Renaissance 2.0 which will reshape the art world as we know it.
